io.r2dbc.spi

Class Option<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.r2dbc.spi.Option<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The value type of the option when configuring a value programmatically

    public final class Option<T>
extends Object
    Represents a configuration option constant.
    See Also:
    ConnectionFactoryOptions, TransactionDefinition
